Senior Software Engineer

Google
Mountain View, CA

About the role

We are seeking a talented Senior Software Engineer to join our team. This role involves working with cutting-edge technologies including JavaScript, React, Node.js, and Python. You will collaborate with cross-functional teams to build scalable cloud solutions on GCP.

Requirements

  • 5+ years of experience in software development
  • Strong proficiency in JavaScript, TypeScript, and Python
  • Experience with React and Node.js
  • Familiarity with cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, or Azure)
  • Experience with Docker and Kubernetes
  • Knowledge of REST APIs and GraphQL

Nice to have

  • Machine Learning or AI experience
  • DevOps practices and CI/CD pipelines
  • Experience with Agile/Scrum methodologies

Benefits

We offer competitive compensation, comprehensive health benefits, and visa sponsorship for qualified candidates. H1B sponsorship available.
